I have looked at online maps and checked requirements for unlocking new monsters. I've cleaned out the altar three times, but still no Mask. Does anybody out there have any answer as to why? I currently have 4th Rank and got the Fire Feather (currently have the Phoenix from combining).

By RaPtOr2157 on Monday, May 29, 2000 - 04:36 pm:

You should be able to get it. You should just keep trying.

By Kurasu Soratobu on Tuesday, May 30, 2000 - 10:57 am:

The Joker Mask is a hard item to get, sometimes. The 'reset' button is your friend when you're doing your exploration for it. Bring a good int monster through and keep cleaning the burned altar. Eventually, you should find it. I'm not aware of any ranks neccessary for it, though if you keep failing, you may need to come back after you've gained a few more ranks.
